instance_template: node(1..5). connected(1,2). connected(2,3). connected(3,4). connected(4,5). at(1). visit(5). #const horizon=10.
generator: atrobot(X, 0) :- at(X). 1 { move(X, Y, T) : connected(X, Y) } 1 :- atrobot(X, T-1), T = 1..horizon. atrobot(Y, T) :- move(X, Y, T), T = 1..horizon. visited(X) :- atrobot(X, T), T = 0..horizon.

hard_constraints.description: In accordance with organizational mission objectives, it is mandatory that every location designated as a visit target is logged as visited by the robot at least once within the specified time horizon.
